item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Akismet Problems
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Akismet Problems
item.description: [...] It has been about six weeks since I wrote my review of Akismet. Things had been going fine, but the last week or so has seen a large increase in the number of comment spam items that are not being caught, especially the yesterday and today. I’ve asked about this via their contact form to see if this is something unique to me or if there is something going on at Akismet. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] It has been about six weeks since I wrote my review of Akismet. Things had been going fine, but the last week or so has seen a large increase in the number of comment spam items that are not being caught, especially the yesterday and today. I’ve asked about this via their contact form to see if this is something unique to me or if there is something going on at Akismet. […]

item.title: By: Matt
item.dc:creator: Matt
item.description: Hmmm your missed is much higher than it should be, I'll check out why this may be.
